Keywords: Cosmic , Future , Phoenix Force , X-Men
Real Name: James Howlett
Special Powers
MUTANT REGENERATION AND COSMIC RESURRECTION: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 and heal Old Man Phoenix half the result.
THE EARTH WAS DEAD AND GONE... YOU SHOULDA LEFT IT THAT WAY: When an opposing character would be KO'd but isn't, after resolutions give them an Unwanted Resurrection token. // Characters with Unwanted Resurrection tokens can't heal, evade, or reduce damage.
THIS TIME, NOTHING ON HEAVEN OR EARTH CAN STOP ME: Charge, Flurry.
RIGHTEOUS ANGER IS ALL THE FUEL I NEED: Battle Fury, Exploit Weakness.

I better go start a trade thread... I'll add a fourth scientist Spider-Man to sweeten the deal!
February 18, 2022
rkb9190
Amazing looking piece, but is 100% a glass cannon, even more so today with all of the penetrating and exploit weakness going around. I took him down with ease using 3 Spider-Men on a Scientist team. He can dish out the damage, but not having reducing penetrating damage is his biggest weakness. 10/10 Sculpt 7/10 Playability
October 5, 2021
SuperClixer
The sculpt of the actual figure is the same size/scale, as the previous smaller size/scale figures. They raise the price and advertise larger scale figures, and then some figures are not larger scale. Bait and switch. Come on Wizkids. Stick to the larger 41 or 41 1/2 scale figures.
January 13, 2021
GL_Alex
If you pulled this piece in your brick/case: you are the big winner of this set. He isn't God Emperor Doom, but he is definitely a powerful fun piece to play that has a gorgeous sculpt and will have your opponents begging for a quick KO.
January 6, 2021
Emtemss
Honestly, this piece looks like it will be the most fun one to play in ages. Definitely the Chase that I will be chasing down. Such a fun looking close combat God.
December 16, 2020
Xavolice
I can't wait to play this figure! I primarily play melee units and he is great at that as usual. I love how consistent his dial is! The 90 point line may be a bit squishy, but 9 clicks of life is enough to utilize that healing trait a few times. A+ WK
